mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.title, r.category, r.content, r.deadline, r.writer_user_id AS writerUserId, u.name AS writerName, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM recruits r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.writer_user_id = u.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruits(title, category, content, deadline, writer_user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{title}, #{category}, #{content}, #{deadline}, #{writerUserId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE recruits SET title = #{title}, category = #{category}, content = #{content}, deadline = #{deadline}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
